other_characters_kitsune_temple.name: The Eidolarch
other_characters_kitsune_temple.notes: Appears in every prophecy — sometimes savior, sometimes destroyer; half-crystalline, half-foxlike depictions; unclear if person, artifact, or event; Jayson may echo their pattern

other_characters_kitsune_temple.name: Matron Kaelith of the Verdant Veil

other_characters_kitsune_temple.notes: Exiled by Varethyn over 300 years ago

other_characters_kitsune_temple.name: Korrin’th

other_characters_kitsune_temple.name: Aelthryn
